author: rcm
msg: Added a fix to forces collection and references to be loaded in in a transient state rather than ghost state (which they will be once the parent object is marked as persistent).

msg: Changed the method signature for resolving fields in object manager

msg: Fixed isPersistent so it returns true when serializing persistent objects
